name: Darkisher Demo
description:
Introduction

Darkisher is a platformer combining intense action with challenging puzzles. It has been acclaimed for its moody art style, ambient and dark atmosphere.

Objective

Opened your eyes in a dark forest. All you know is your sister's not with you, so she's missing! While trying to get out of this place, you are searching for your sister and hit the road.

Controls
  • W-A-S-D: Movement
  • Space: Jump
  • Shift: Run
  • E: Interact
  • CTRL/C: Crouch
  • ESC/P: Pause Menu

This game can be played by gamepad. However, you may not be able to interact with the menu buttons in the demo version only.

Platform
  • Windows 64-bit

The full version is planned to be released on more platforms.

Credit
  • Gökdeniz Çetin (DryreL) - LinkedIn - GitHub - Website
Note

This is a demo version of Darkisher. Full version is in development. Unfortunately, we cannot give a release date, as we are still in the early stages.

- Save/Checkpoint is not available on demo. Sorry!

We would like to get feedbacks from everyone with this demo. Please participate in the comments section. Thank you!
